Having successfully completed this course, students will be able to:

- Read, write, test, and debug code using top-down design.
- Use computational thinking to solve problems.
- Explain the efficiency of algorithms by predicting the Big-O run time of code.
- Design and write an `R` package and deploy it on [Github](https://github.com/).
- Design and write an `R` shiny application and deploy it on [Github](https://github.com/).
